chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: lattice
x: Poset.sort tp

Goal:
lat_bot <== x

Premises:
Notation tp := (Lattice.poset A)
Notation lattice := Lattice.type
lat_bot = lbot : A
Poset.sort = fun t : poset => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : poset -> Type Poset.sort is a coercion
Record ideal (T : poset) (P : T) : Type := Ideal { id_val : Poset.sort T; id_pf : id_val <== P } Arguments ideal [T] Arguments Ideal [T P id_val]
pairLattice = fun A B : lattice => Lattice.Pack {| Lattice.base := {| Poset.mixin := pairPosetMixin A B |}; Lattice.mixin := pairLatticeMixin A B |} (A * B) : lattice -> lattice -> lattice
Lattice.poset = fun cT : lattice => Poset.Pack (Lattice.class cT) cT : lattice -> poset Lattice.poset is a coercion
Lattice.sort = fun t : lattice => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : lattice -> Type Lattice.sort is a coercion
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
idealLattice : forall T : lattice, T -> lattice
app_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : lattice x : A |- Type] ?T : [A : lattice x : A |- poset]
dfunLattice : forall A : Type, (A -> lattice) -> lattice
dapp_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : lattice x : A |- Type] ?T : [A : lattice x : A |- ?A -> poset]
Lattice.Pack : forall sort : Type, Lattice.class_of sort -> Type -> lattice
subLattice : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> lattice
funLattice = fun (A : Type) (B : lattice) => Lattice.Pack {| Lattice.base := {| Poset.mixin := funPosetMixin A B |}; Lattice.mixin := funLatticeMixin A B |} (A -> B) : Type -> lattice -> lattice Arguments funLattice _%type_scope
lbot = fun T : lattice => sup Pred0 : forall T : lattice, T Arguments lbot {T}
propLattice = Lattice.Pack {| Lattice.base := {| Poset.mixin := propPosetMixin |}; Lattice.mixin := propLatticeMixin |} Prop : lattice
Lattice.clone : forall (T : Type) (cT : lattice) (c : Lattice.class_of T), phant_id (Lattice.class cT) c -> lattice
Lattice.pack : forall (T : Type) (b0 : Poset.class_of T) (m0 m : Lattice.mixin_of (Poset.Pack b0 T)), phant_id m0 m -> lattice
Lattice.sup = fun cT : lattice => [eta Lattice.mx_sup (Lattice.mixin (Lattice.class cT))] : forall cT : lattice, Pred cT -> cT Arguments Lattice.sup {cT}
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
relaxP : forall (T : poset) (P1 P2 : T), P1 <== P2 -> forall p : T, p <== P1 -> p <== P2
sup_closed = fun T : lattice => [Pred s | forall d : Pred_Class, d <=p s -> sup d \In s] : forall T : lattice, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments sup_closed {T}
poset_asym : forall (T : poset) (x y : T), x <== y -> y <== x -> x = y
prop_supM : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : propPoset), (forall q : Prop, q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_sup s <== p
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
prop_botP : forall x : [posetofProp], prop_bot <== x
proj1_mono = fun (T1 T2 : poset) (_top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p <== y -> p.1 <== y.1) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p0 <== y -> p0.1 <== y.1) p) := _top_assumption_ in _evar_0_ x x0) (fun (x1 : T1) (x2 : T2) (__top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => (x1, x2) <== p -> (x1, x2).1 <== p.1)...
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
proj2_mono = fun (T1 T2 : poset) (_top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p <== y -> p.2 <== y.2) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p0 <== y -> p0.2 <== y.2) p) := _top_assumption_ in _evar_0_ x x0) (fun (x1 : T1) (x2 : T2) (__top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => (x1, x2) <== p -> (x1, x2).2 <== p.2)...
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
botP : forall (D : cpo) (x : D), bot <== x
poset_refl : forall (T : poset) (x : T), x <== x
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
ideal_supM : forall (T : lattice) (P : T) (s : Pred (ideal P)) (p : idealPoset P), (forall q : ideal P, q \In s -> q <== p) -> ideal_sup s <== p
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
prod_mono = fun (S1 S2 T1 T2 : poset) (f1 : S1 -> T1) (f2 : S2 -> T2) (M1 : monotone f1) (M2 : monotone f2) (__top_assumption_ : pairPoset S1 S2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : S1) (b : S2), (fun p : S1 * S2 => forall y : pairPoset S1 S2, p <== y -> (f1 \* f2) p <== (f1 \* f2) y) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : S1 * S2 => forall y : pairPoset S1 S2, p0 <== y -> (f1 \* f2) p0 <== (f1 \* f2) y) p) := __top_assumption_ in _evar_0_ x x0) (fun (x1 : S1) (x2 : S2) (__top_assumption_0...
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
fun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), (forall q : A -> B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> fun_sup s <== p

``` 
unfold lat_bot. unfold "<==". simpl. intros. apply (mx_bot (coerce x)).
